Default: That was the wrong janitorial maneuver.
Default [es]: Esa no era la maniobra de conserje correcta.

Default: The trap works on bunnies AND children.
Default [es]: La trampa funciona con conejos Y niños.

Default: Caw caw caw-runch!
Default [es]: ¡Crá-cra-cra-crunch!

Default: Did you really just 'boop' the gator?
Default [es]: ¿En serio intentaste hacerle “boop” al caimán?

Default: You should really go see the nurse before the bell rings.
Default [es]: Deberías ver a la enfermera antes de que suene la campana.

Default: Perhaps Mr. Scippio was trying to warn you about something in secret.
Default [es]: Quizá el Sr. Scippio intentaba advertirte de algo... en secreto.

Default: Who even puts a giant pit in a principal's office?
Default [es]: ¿Quién pone un pozo gigante en la oficina del director?

Default: It's like that one rabbit from that movie!
Default [es]: ¡Como ese conejo de la película!

Default: That was the wrong book.
Default [es]: Ese era el libro equivocado.

Default: The blue flowers sure do smell funny.
Default [es]: Las flores azules sí que huelen raro.

Default: Nugget sure is different after he ate goo and broke his legs.
Default [es]: Nugget definitivamente cambió después de comer goo y romperse las piernas.

Default: It sure would be nice if there was a beanstalk there.
Default [es]: Sería genial si hubiera una planta de frijol ahí.

Default: Vending machines are really heavy.
Default [es]: Las máquinas expendedoras pesan un montón.

Default: That bell sure is loud!
Default [es]: ¡Esa campana sí que suena fuerte!

Default: Bad puppy!
Default [es]: ¡Perrito malo!

Default: Touching fire is bad.
Default [es]: Tocar fuego es mala idea.

Default: You were just gonna leave her burning like that?
Default [es]: ¿De verdad ibas a dejarla ardiendo así?

Default: You might want to handle the burning teacher with a little more urgency.
Default [es]: Quizá deberías apurarte con la maestra en llamas.

Default: Those missiles really work!
Default [es]: ¡Esos misiles sí funcionan!

Default: Those lab security measures really hurt.
Default [es]: Las medidas de seguridad del laboratorio sí que duelen.

Default: You should get out of the lab BEFORE it explodes. Not after.
Default [es]: Deberías salir del laboratorio ANTES de que explote. No después.

Default: I liked Alice better before she changed into a murderous creature.
Default [es]: Me caía mejor Alice antes de que se volviera una criatura asesina.

Default: Who could have possibly seen that coming?
Default [es]: ¿Quién podría haberlo visto venir?

Default: Did you forget about Birdy's promise?
Default [es]: ¿Se te olvidó la promesa de Birdy?

Default: Nugget could probably convince the bird to not do that to you if he wasn't dead.
Default [es]: Nugget podría convencer al pájaro de no hacerte eso... si no estuviera muerto.

Default: Nugget could probably convince the bird to not do that to you if he wasn't in study hall.
Default [es]: Nugget podría convencer al pájaro de no hacerte eso... si no estuviera en la sala de estudio.

Default: What did you think would happen?
Default [es]: ¿Qué pensabas que iba a pasar?

Default: Try not to be on the roof when the day ends.
Default [es]: Intenta no estar en el techo cuando termine el día.

Default: You should give Kevin something that signifies friendship. A tasty nugget perhaps?
Default [es]: Deberías darle a Kevin algo que signifique amistad. ¿Quizá un nugget sabroso?

Default: Beep. Beep. Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep.
Default [es]: Beep. Beep. Beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep.

Default: Stepping on the hay is a great way to wake Kevin.
Default [es]: Pisar el heno es la mejor forma de despertar a Kevin.

Default: The teacher really wants those signatures.
Default [es]: La maestra realmente quiere esas firmas.

Default: Those flowers are a little dangerous.
Default [es]: Esas flores son un poco peligrosas.

Default: I would use the gun on something...or someone before the robot gets there.
Default [es]: Yo usaría la pistola en algo... o en alguien antes de que llegue el robot.

Default: If only there was someone who could throw something at the robot...if only.
Default [es]: Si tan solo hubiera alguien que pudiera lanzarle algo al robot... si tan solo.

Default: If only there was something sharp and heavy you could smash the robot into pieces with...
Default [es]: Si tan solo tuvieras algo filoso y pesado para hacer trizas al robot...

Default: He's not just gonna let you go back inside.
Default [es]: No te va a dejar volver a entrar así como así.

Default: He's not just gonna let you help Nugget.
Default [es]: No te va a dejar ayudar a Nugget tan fácilmente.

Default: You kinda deserve a cannon to the face if you're just gonna wait around like that.
Default [es]: Si te quedas ahí parado, te mereces un cañonazo en la cara.

Default: I feel like you should know what happens when you get too close to Booboo by now.
Default [es]: A estas alturas, deberías saber qué pasa si te acercas demasiado a Booboo.

Default: He can really sniff you out anywhere.
Default [es]: Booboo puede olfatearte en cualquier rincón.

Default: You should find a way to subdue Booboo before Nugget's arm gives out.
Default [es]: Deberías encontrar cómo calmar a Booboo antes de que el brazo de Nugget se rinda.

Default: Booboo does not have a good way to stop Beepboop.
Default [es]: Booboo no tiene ni idea de cómo detener a Beepboop.

Default: Bunny does not have a good way to stop Beepboop.
Default [es]: Bunny tampoco sabe cómo parar a Beepboop.

Default: Guppy isn't as effective as a rock when it comes to stopping Beepboop.
Default [es]: Guppy es menos útil que una piedra contra Beepboop.

Default: Regis knows how to deal with Bunny.
Default [es]: Regis sabe cómo lidiar con Bunny.

Default: Guppy isn't enough to stop Regis from shooting you in the face.
Default [es]: Guppy no basta para evitar que Regis te dispare en la cara.

Default: Guppy is NOT able to stop the missile.
Default [es]: Guppy NO puede detener el misil.

Default: You can't save Kevin without Davey.
Default [es]: No puedes salvar a Kevin sin Davey.

Default: Davey died.
Default [es]: Davey murió.

Default: You died.
Default [es]: Moriste.

Default: Linda died.
Default [es]: Linda murió.

Default: That would have been a good time to send Guppy.
Default [es]: Hubiera sido un buen momento para mandar a Guppy.

Default: You should probably hide from that laser.
Default [es]: Quizá deberías esconderte de ese láser.

Default: Maybe don't shoot the giant lizard that's trying to help you?
Default [es]: ¿Tal vez no dispares al lagarto gigante que intenta ayudarte?

Default: Maybe aim for a different target next time?
Default [es]: La próxima vez, intenta apuntar a otro objetivo.

Default: That was the wrong hiding spot.
Default [es]: Ese no era el escondite correcto.

Default: Regis wasn't close enough to the anti-goo tank.
Default [es]: Regis no estaba lo suficientemente cerca del tanque anti-goo.

Default: It might be wise to deal with the orb a little later.
Default [es]: Quizá sea mejor encargarse del orbe un poco después.

Default: He really really wants those bandages.
Default [es]: De verdad, de VERDAD, quiere esas vendas.

Default: You should probably go inside to get those bandages.
Default [es]: Quizás deberías entrar a buscar esas vendas.

Default: No arm. No life.
Default [es]: Sin brazo, sin vida.

Default: Carrots are great bunny bait.
Default [es]: Las zanahorias atraen conejos... y problemas.

Default: You should boop and run.
Default [es]: Mejor boopea y corre.

Default: I would put the bait on the X next time.
Default [es]: La próxima vez pon la carnada en la X.

Default: You knew he was gonna kill something today.
Default [es]: Sabías que hoy iba a matar algo.

Default: His legs are REALLY strong now.
Default [es]: Ahora sí que tiene piernas de acero.

Default: Find a place to put that goo thing or it'll explode.
Default [es]: Pon ese goo en algún lado o va a explotar.

Default: You should probably wait until Regis isn't there to go down the slide.
Default [es]: Mejor espera a que Regis se vaya antes de tirarte por el tobogán.

Default: That was not a valid code.
Default [es]: Ese no era el código correcto.

Default: Something bad happened.
Default [es]: Pasó algo malo.

Default: Maybe someone could cause some electrical problems for the robot?
Default [es]: ¿Y si alguien le causa un cortocircuito al robot?

Default: That was not a valid quacking code.
Default [es]: Ese no era el código cuac.

Default: I think Booboo is a little territorial about that tree right now.
Default [es]: Booboo no quiere compartir ese árbol hoy.

Default: I would stay away from Booboo while he's trying to get on the fort.
Default [es]: No te acerques a Booboo cuando quiere subir al fuerte.

Default: Even if he's distracted, you should still stay away from Booboo.
Default [es]: Aunque esté distraído, mejor aléjate de Booboo.

Default: You can't hide from him in the tree either.
Default [es]: Tampoco puedes esconderte de él en el árbol.

Default: You should fear the bunny.
Default [es]: Deberías temerle al conejito.

Default: You should return the hall pass before the bell rings.
Default [es]: Devuelve el pase antes de que suene la campana.

Default: You should get the nurse to fix Felix's face.
Default [es]: Busca a la enfermera para arreglarle la cara a Felix.

Default: That was the wrong janitor manuever.
Default [es]: Esa no era la maniobra correcta del conserje.

Default: That was the wrong order for the cars.
Default [es]: Ese no era el orden correcto de los coches.
